articles.caption: A look at MrBeast joining Fortnite with his own skins + $1M challenge
articles.title: MrBeast is joining Fortnite with his own skins and a $1 million challenge - The Verge

articles.caption: A look at Metaverse company Infinite Reality going public through a $1.85B SPAC
articles.title: Metaverse company Infinite Reality will go public through $1.85B SPAC | VentureBeat
articles.description: Metaverse company Infinite Reality will go public through a SPAC. The deal will give at least $128 million to IR at a value of $1.85 billion.

articles.caption: A look at translating real-world marketing goals into your metaverse strategy
articles.title: Translating real-world marketing goals into your metaverse strategy | VentureBeat
articles.description: The metaverse has tremendous opportunity up for grabs, but brands also need best practices for activating properly.

articles.caption: A look at the App Store's new pricing upgrades
articles.title: App Store Gets a Pricing Upgrade ‚Äî Naavik
articles.description:
While it‚Äôs Apple‚Äôs 30% tax that often gets the headlines, this week Apple 
announced it would let developers institute more flexible pricing

articles.caption: A look at Browsers, an answer to the walled gardens
articles.title: Browsers: An Answer to Walled Gardens
articles.description: Browsers offer a future for game developers that would give mobile and PC developers the ability to circumvent any and all walled gardens

articles.caption: A look at Supercell pulling loot boxes for more "deterministic rewards"
articles.title: Loot boxes pulled from Brawl Stars in favor of "deterministic rewards"
articles.description: Supercell is removing loot boxes from its mobile battler Brawl Stars four years after the title launched.

articles.caption: A look at Illuvium releasing Overworld
articles.title: The Block: Illuvium releases Overworld as it attempts to bring AAA quality to web3 gaming
articles.description: A new game for Illuvium has gone live ‚Äî if you‚Äôre one of the 30,000 lucky community members selected to try it out.

articles.caption: A look at Oasys mainnet going live

articles.description: Oasys completed the final phase of its mainnet, marking a significant milestone for the gaming-focused blockchain firm.
